directions: Stir yogurt, pineapple, raisins, coconut, and honey together in a bowl; add carrots. Stir until ingredients are thoroughly combined. Refrigerate until chilled, about 30 minutes. Stir again before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 cup pineapple tidbits in pineapple juice, undrained
title: Spiralized Carrot Ambrosia Salad
